attributes.action: Limit any individual elected as PM to 2 terms of Office or a lifetime maximum of 10yrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To prevent any individual from becoming too detatched from normal people. It would appear from the experience of Maggie Thatcher and Tony Blair that the layers of isolation increase exponetially with time. This is not a party issue as it effects all politcal parties equally.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
